Texto: 
non-contributory
none
post-operative and post-traumatic changes left frontal and parietal lobes.

mild diffuse atrophy right cerebellar hemisphere
crossed cerebellar diaschisis
• trauma
• infarction
• dilantin therapy (usually bilateral cerebellar atrophy)
history of left hemisphere truamatic hematoma removed at age 4 or 5.

now presents with seizures
